mapper.sql: id, activity_name, activity_title, activity_description, address_id, create_user_id, create_time, end_time, deleted
mapper.insert: insert into activity (activity_name, activity_title, activity_description, address_id, create_user_id, create_time, end_time, deleted) values (#{activityName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{activityTitle,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{activityDescription,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{addressId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{createUserId,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{endTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{deleted,jdbcType=TINYINT})

activity_name,

deleted,

mapper.update:
update activity
activity_name = #{activityName,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
activity_title = #{activityTitle,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
activity_description = #{activityDescription,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
address_id = #{addressId,jdbcType=BIGINT},

create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
end_time = #{endTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
deleted = #{deleted,jdbcType=TINYINT},
where id = #{id,jdbcType=BIGINT}
